name: Blaster Hazard
description:
Blast your way though 3 unique shmup-style stages each complete with their own boss and enemies on your quest to rid the moon of the notorious Gravity Man... or something.

CONTROLS:

  • Left / Right Arrows : Move
  • Up Arrow : Aim upwards
  • Z / SPACE : Jump / select in menus.
  • X / SHIFT : Hold to shoot

Kill enemies to gain score which will grant you an extra hit when you reach 100.

Completing the game will unlock New Game+ which removes checkpoints and certain 1ups, there is no new content behind this mode.

GAME BY sarn WITH MUSIC BY Mista Jub

The OST can be found here.
